Package space.sunqian.common.net.tcp

package space.sunqian.common.net.tcp
Provides builders to rapidly build TCP server and client with minimal effort, using codes similar to the following: 

 TcpServer server = TcpServer.newBuilder()
     .handler(handler)
     .bind();
 TcpClient client = TcpClient.newBuilder()
     .bind(address)
     .connect();

Core interfaces:

  • TcpServer
  • TcpClient

    Description
    space.sunqian.common.net
    Provides utilities and interfaces for network, such as Http client, TCP client and server, UDP sender and server.
    space.sunqian.common.net.http
    Provides http utilities and interfaces to request http server with minimal effort, using codes similar to the following:
    space.sunqian.common.net.udp

  • Class
    Description
    TcpClient
    Represents a TCP client based on an underlying SocketChannel, can be built with TcpClient.newBuilder().
    TcpClientBuilder
    Builder for building new instances of TcpClient by SocketChannel.
    TcpContext
    Represents context of a tcp channel for TCP network, based on SocketChannel.
    TcpKit
    Utilities for TCP.
    TcpServer
    Represents a TCP server, can be built with TcpServer.newBuilder().
    TcpServerBuilder
    Builder for building new instances of TcpServer by ServerSocketChannel and SocketChannel.
    TcpServerHandler
    Handler for handling tcp server events for TCP network server, based on ServerSocketChannel and SocketChannel.
